title: Internet and LAN
text: IIT Kharagpur operates the largest academic network in the eastern region of India. Internet access is provided through both wired and wireless connections from academic areas, halls of residences, and the residential complex.

title: VPN
text:
Access to restricted applications (WhatsApp, Messenger, Torrents, etc.) can be gained through the use of VPN applications .
Following is a non-exhaustive list of working VPNs:
• Windows: Psiphon
• MacOS: FreeVPN Org , Hotspot Shield VPN
• Linux: Self hosted OpenVPN
• Android: Psiphon
• iOS: Psiphon
• Router: OpenVPN hosted on Azure/AWS/DigitalOcean Server
You can self host OpenVPN server on AWS / Azure / DigitalOcean for free for 12 months per service:
• Tutorial to setup OpenVPN on Azure Server - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OISyfkvxUaQ
• Tutorial to setup OpenVPN on AWS Server [ 1 ] - https://iitkgp-network.netlify.app/#/general/vpn

title: Windows
text: DC++ is one of the most popular DC clients for Windows. After installing the software, set the current proxy to direct connection, set manual configuration to Active mode and upload 100 GB or more data to get access to DC. Connect to the current HUB address. You can also follow the windows quick start guide from here . ApexDC is a good alternative to DC++ that works well.

title: Linux
text: LinuxDC++ is a Linux port of DC++. Though it is primarily aimed at Linux, it has been shown to work on other Unix-based operating systems as well. Another alternative is Eiskaltdcpp-qt which has a slightly better interface. Download any one of them from Software centre. Configure the client as the same way as windows DC++

title: OS X
text: To use DC on Mac OS X you can use Shakespeer . Just Download it and after installing it goto preferences and then identity and choose your nick, then in share choose location for download and incomplete folder and add files. Now click connect hub button and enter the hub address.

title: DNS
text: IIT KGP has it's own DNS servers which is used by default. The network does not allow requests to any other DNS servers like Google DNS or Cloudflare DNS . To use these, you need to setup a VPN, the steps for which is given under VPN section of this article.
